meanings.sent1: She looked lovely in her frocked dress.
meanings.sent2: The children were frocked for the school play.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of frocked guests.
meanings.sent4: The garden was frocked with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The room was frocked with elegant curtains.

meanings.sent1: She frocked herself quickly before the event.
meanings.sent2: He frocked his daughter in her favorite outfit.
meanings.sent3: The magician frocked himself in a cloak of mystery.
meanings.sent4: The chef frocked the cake with layers of frosting.
meanings.sent5: The artist frocked the canvas with vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The frocked mannequin displayed the latest fashion.
meanings.sent2: The room was frocked with beautiful tapestries.
meanings.sent3: The garden was frocked with twinkling lights.
meanings.sent4: The cake was frocked with intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The bride was frocked in a stunning gown.
